basics.name: Matt Richards
basics.label: Technical Leader | Senior Software Engineer | Data & Integrations
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer and technical leader with a strong background in building scalable data platforms, integrations, and API-driven systems. Passionate about hands-on engineering, system design, and enabling teams to deliver reliable, maintainable software. Comfortable contributing at both the IC and manager level across the full software development lifecycle.

work.name: Allvue Systems
work.position: Director, Data Engineering / Senior Principal Architect
highlights: Directed four cross-functional engineering teams to deliver a modern data platform supporting 60+ client deployments and processing millions of records daily, built on Snowflake, Kafka, TypeScript, and .NET.
Oversaw the design and delivery of core APIs, ELT pipelines, and integration frameworks supporting both internal products and external client data needs.
Partnered with product and executive leadership to define platform strategy and roadmap, aligning technical delivery with business goals.
Instituted engineering best practices across teams, including regular design/code reviews, architectural reviews, and onboarding processes.
Led evaluation and adoption of third-party tools to enhance development velocity and data pipeline reliability.
Mentored engineering managers and senior ICs, fostering technical growth, career development, and cross-team collaboration.

work.name: Allvue Systems
highlights: Directed engineering efforts for internal reporting, client dashboards, and platform health monitoring across multiple teams.
Owned operational tooling including report refresh automation, audit event pipelines, and API telemetry systems, improving observability and issue resolution speed.
Maintained dbt/Snowflake pipelines supporting internal metrics and client-facing dashboards, ensuring high reliability and timely data delivery.
Introduced Power BI usage analytics and standardized dashboard templates to improve adoption, maintainability, and performance of reporting tools.
Led incident reviews and cross-team retrospectives, reducing recurrence of platform issues and improving client satisfaction.
Collaborated with Product, Support, and Engineering leaders to prioritize platform reliability and end-to-end operational visibility.

work.name: Allvue Systems
highlights: Managed and trained a team of Professional Services Engineers to implement our products.
Designed and built custom configurations and plugins for our products using C#, XSLT, SQL, XML and XPath.
Worked directly with clients to help define and drive the direction for implementation of Allvue products and to support and train on new features/configurations.
Managed cross-client and cross-team resourcing for new and ongoing projects alongside constant flow of escalations from client support teams.

work.name: Allvue Systems
highlights: Worked with the founding team to design and build a generic workflow, integration and data management platform used by our clients to manage their portfolio of investments, research investment opportunities, and perform and track trading.

Built and owned the integration components of the platform allowing connectivity for bi-directional communication with a variety of other systems out-of-the-box and the ability to build custom integrations via plugin.
Worked directly with existing and prospective clients to understand requirements, define new features and solve problems.
Trained and mentored new engineers on our technologies and how our clients use our products.

work.name: Soapbox Mobile
highlights: Worked with internal and external clients to specify and build new application modules using PHP, JavaScript, and Python running over PostgreSQL and MySQL back-ends.
Participated in design and implementation of new architecture for high volume text messaging system with an extensive client-facing web front-end.

work.name: LPL Financial
highlights: Built out a library of common components for use across applications while migrating legacy applications to new web technologies (ASP.Net 2.0).
Led a team of software engineers to complete projects from design to implementation to release.

work.name: Aviatech
highlights: Built applications and tools for new email/web-based marketing campaigns using .NET and SQL Server.

work.name: SMS.ac
highlights: Primary responsibilities included design and development of web applications in ASP.NET and VBScript running on over 40 Load-Balanced Web Servers (IIS5/6) serving over 200,000 users per day.
Lead Engineer/Architect for two of our highest traffic applications (Registration and User Profiles)
Led and Engineered efforts to optimize old code to maximize performance through use of data caching, memory sharing between applications, splitting of applications to new subdomains.
Responsible for code reviews and ensuring unit testing of all methods accessing the Databases was complete prior to application launch.

work.name: mCentric SA
highlights: Coordinated development and installation of new services in customer environments.
Built Web and WAP applications using Java Server Pages running over an Oracle 8 back end.
Integration and functionality testing of all applications before delivery to the customer.
Basic maintenance of pre-production and development servers (Solaris 8) in customer facilities.
Internal Infrastructure tasks including user creation, PC/Network maintenance. (Solaris and Windows)
